医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究：死于癌症的风险取决于你住在英格兰的地方根据《柳叶刀肿瘤学》发表的一项研究，英国男性和女性死亡人数最多的 10 种癌症的死亡风险因人们居住的地区而异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Study-Risk-of-dying-from-cancer-depends-on-where-you-live-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Study-Risk-of-dying-from-cancer-depends-on-where-you-live-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35559ac9-c709-4837-975a-883c57a88b45 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 21:22:09 -0500 Study: Risk of dying from cancer depends on where you live in England
B细胞淋巴瘤的双重打击：CAR T细胞创新提高疗效，降低毒性马拉汉医学研究所与惠灵顿兆泰疗法有限公司合作今天宣布了其新型第三代抗 CD19 嵌合抗原受体 (CAR) T 细胞疗法的 1 期剂量递增试验结果，该疗法将在美国癌症学会上发表血液学 (ASH) 年会于 12 月 11 日下午 3 点在圣地亚哥举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Double-punch-for-B-cell-lymphomas-CAR-T-cell-innovation-boosts-efficacy-cuts-toothity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Double-punch-for-B-cell-lymphomas-CAR-T-cell-innovation-boosts-efficacy-cuts-toothity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12847997-8a04-4db7-8c14-4d1f724bb1e7 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 21:06:17 -0500 Double punch for B-cell lymphomas: CAR T-cell innovation boosts efficacy, cuts toxicity
现代疗法使黑人白血病患者的存活率大幅上升宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院和宾夕法尼亚大学医学院艾布拉姆森癌症中心的研究人员在第 65 届美国学会上发表的一项研究表明，随着新疗法的出现，患有急性髓性白血病 (AML) 的非西班牙裔黑人患者的寿命更长了血液学 (ASH) 年会和博览会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Survival-rates-of-black-病人-with-leukemia-soar-with-modern-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Survival-rates-of-black-病人-with-leukemia-soar-with-modern-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5dc36cb3-3c54-493b-b4d1-54c9cf0d7127 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 20:59:35 -0500 Survival rates of black patients with leukemia soar with modern therapies
生酮饮食被证明可有效控制多囊肾病官方消息：在第一个生酮代谢疗法治疗 PKD 的随机对照临床试验中，生酮饮食被证明可以有效控制多囊肾病 (PKD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Ketogenic-diet-proved-to-be- effective-at-controlling-polycystic-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Ketogenic-diet-proved-to-be- effective-at-controlling-polycystic-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a5a641e-043d-4be6-8b77-d90a9b2ec903 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 20:40:56 -0500 Ketogenic diet proved to be effective at controlling polycystic kidney disease
白血病的个性化治疗可延长寿命并减少副作用一项 III 期试验发现，针对最常见的成人白血病的个性化治疗可以帮助患者延长生存时间并保持缓解状态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Personalized-treatment-for-leukemia-results-in-longer-life-and-fewer-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Personalized-treatment-for-leukemia-results-in-longer-life-and-fewer-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90a5b5e7-c4cb-49c3-8dbf-1a4ec36e38c0 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 20:35:39 -0500 Personalized treatment for leukemia results in longer life and fewer side effects
手术引流中的淋巴液可以为头颈癌提供更精确的治疗手术引流管中的淋巴液通常被扔进垃圾桶，但它们在匹兹堡大学和圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院的研究人员手中却是一笔财富，他们发现这种液体可以为头部和脑部疾病患者提供更精确的治疗。由人乳头瘤病毒（HPV）引起的颈部癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Lymphatic-fluid-from-surgical-drains-could-inform-more-precise-treatments-for-head-and-neck-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Lymphatic-fluid-from-surgical-drains-could-inform-more-precise-treatments-for-head-and-neck-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2211551-6e5c-4d04-9a42-67aad2f03ccb Mon, 11 Dec 2023 20:12:00 -0500 Lymphatic fluid from surgical drains could inform more precise treatments for head and neck cancer
UMSOM 获得 2900 万美元研究奖，以改善注射阿片类药物患者的健康结果马里兰大学医学院院长 Mark T. Gladwin 医学博士今天宣布，该学院将在四年内从美国国立卫生研究院获得 2900 万美元的研究奖，以领导一项旨在改善注射者健康结果的多中心试验阿片类药物，并因吸毒引起的感染并发症而住院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/UMSOM-receives-2429-million-research-award-to-improve-health-outcomes-in-people-who-inject-opioid-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/UMSOM-receives-2429-million-research-award-to-improve-health-outcomes-in-people-who-inject-opioid-drugs.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee0083d7-11fb-47d4-b641-1d8edfe6ad10 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 20:05:29 -0500 UMSOM receives $29 million research award to improve health outcomes in people who inject opioid drugs
加州大学圣地亚哥分校健康中心完成对阿尔瓦拉多医院医疗中心的收购2023年12月11日，加州大学圣地亚哥分校健康中心成功完成从Prime Healthcare收购阿尔瓦拉多医院医疗中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/UC-San-Diego-Health-completes-purchase-of-Alvarado-Hospital-Medical-Center.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/UC-San-Diego-Health-completes-purchase-of-Alvarado-Hospital-Medical-Center.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31277285-1e14-44ec-98f8-9403aaa2363a Mon, 11 Dec 2023 19:49:45 -0500 UC San Diego Health completes purchase of Alvarado Hospital Medical Center
健康的植物性饮食可降低 2 型糖尿病的风险至少 75% 的 2 型糖尿病病例可以通过采取健康的生活方式来避免。植物性饮食已被证明在其中发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Healthy-plant-based-diet-linked-with-lower-risk-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Healthy-plant-based-diet-linked-with-lower-risk-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efdc2811-def1-42d5-b964-6e844c93909a Mon, 11 Dec 2023 19:46:17 -0500 Healthy plant-based diet associated with lower risk of type 2 diabetes
新的 SARS-CoV-2 变种 JN.1 显示传播性和免疫抵抗力增强BioRxiv 上发表的一项日本研究探讨了 SARS-CoV-2 JN.1 变种的病毒学特征，发现其具有更高的有效繁殖数和更强的对其他变种免疫的抵抗力，这可能是由于 L455S 刺突蛋白突变所致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/New-SARS-CoV-2-variant-JN1-shows-increased-transmissibility-and-immune-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/New-SARS-CoV-2-variant-JN1-shows-increased-transmissibility-and-immune-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3e05b26-ecdc-4ed8-b565-9dafa21922c3 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 19:45:00 -0500 New SARS-CoV-2 variant JN.1 shows increased transmissibility and immune resistance
